templates.summary: アイデア比較テンプレート
templates.content: <svg viewBox="0 0 800 600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><rect x="50" y="50" width="300" height="500" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="450" y="50" width="300" height="500" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><text x="200" y="100" text-anchor="middle" font-size="24" fill="#1e40af">アイデアA</text><text x="600" y="100" text-anchor="middle" font-size="24" fill="#1e40af">アイデアB</text><rect x="75" y="150" width="250" height="80" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#93c5fd" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="75" y="250" width="250" height="80" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#93c5fd" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="75" y="350" width="250" height="80" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#93c5fd" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="475" y="150" width="250" height="80" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#93c5fd" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="475" y="250" width="250" height="80" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#93c5fd" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="475" y="350" width="250" height="80" rx="5" fill="white" stroke="#93c5fd" stroke-width="2"/><text x="200" y="190" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#64748b">メリット1を入力</text><text x="200" y="290" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#64748b">メリット2を入力</text><text x="200" y="390" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#64748b">メリット3を入力</text><text x="600" y="190" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#64748b">メリット1を入力</text><text x="600" y="290" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#64748b">メリット2を入力</text><text x="600" y="390" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#64748b">メリット3を入力</text></svg>

templates.summary: プロセスフローテンプレート
templates.content: <svg viewBox="0 0 800 400" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><defs><marker id="arrow" viewBox="0 0 10 10" refX="9" refY="5" markerWidth="6" markerHeight="6" orient="auto"><path d="M 0 0 L 10 5 L 0 10 z" fill="#60a5fa"/></marker></defs><rect x="50" y="150" width="150" height="80" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="300" y="150" width="150" height="80" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><rect x="550" y="150" width="150" height="80" rx="10" fill="#f0f9ff" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2"/><line x1="200" y1="190" x2="300" y2="190" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)"/><line x1="450" y1="190" x2="550" y2="190" stroke="#60a5fa" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#arrow)"/><text x="125" y="190" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#64748b">ステップ1</text><text x="375" y="190" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#64748b">ステップ2</text><text x="625" y="190" text-anchor="middle" font-size="16" fill="#64748b">ステップ3</text></svg>
